wikipedia_page.main: John James Morrow (born 20 November 1971) is a Northern Irish former footballer who played as a forward. Born in Belfast, he played professionally for Linfield, Rangers, Oldham Athletic and Greenock Morton. He also had a trial at Manchester United in October 1987, shortly before his 16th birthday.
